dcterms:creator: A. C. Nwala
A. Flammini
F. Menczer
dcterms:description: The Behavioral Languages for Online Characterization (BLOC) provides formal languages that represent the behaviors of social media accounts irrespective of social media platform, user-agent (human or bot), or intent (malicious or benign).
dcterms:title: BLOC

dcterms:creator: K.-C. Yang
E. Ferrara
F. Menczer
dcterms:description: Botometer is a publicly available supervised machine learning system that classifies a given Twitter account as bot or human-controlled, utilizing over 1,000 features grouped into categories focusing on different account characteristics.
dcterms:title: Botometer
